question: Which tag is used to define a hyperlink in HTML?
Which tag is used to display an image in HTML?
What does the `alt` attribute in an `` tag do?
options: Provides alternative text for the image if it cannot be displayed
Sets the alignment of the image
Sets the image width and height
answer: Provides alternative text for the image if it cannot be displayed
